Body:
fa = mod.FileAnalyzer({}, {})
ext_regex = '202[0-9][0-1][0-9][0-3][0-9]'
file_name = (datetime.datetime.utcnow() - datetime.timedelta(days=200)).date(
    ).isoformat().replace('-', '')
assert fa._filenamedate_op_argdate(file_name, None, ext_regex, '%Y%m%d',
    'lt', '10d') is True
assert fa._filenamedate_op_argdate(file_name, None, ext_regex, '%Y%m%d',
    'gt', '1000d') is True
file_name = 'a20200101b'
assert fa._filenamedate_op_argdate(file_name, None, ext_regex, '%Y%m%d',
    'lt', '10d') is True
